assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of spring in Greece
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and warm, showcasing blooming landscapes and coastal views
assetRequirements.content_context: A scenic view of Greece in spring, featuring blooming flowers, blue skies, and inviting beaches.

assetRequirements.purpose: highlight the beauty of Greece during spring
assetRequirements.visual_style: natural and serene, emphasizing the comfort of spring weather
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of Greek coastal towns and local cuisine that evoke a sense of relaxation and cultural richness.

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Весна в Греции ждет вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected These promotional icons will highlight special offers and early booking tips, facilitating customer engagement and encouraging action.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
